name: KASINADHUNI DURGAMBA BUTCHIAH TRUST
briefDescription: VISION :“ Yoman pasyanti sarvatra sarvamscha mayi pasyati,Tasyaaham na pranesyami suchamena pranasyati – Gita “On who sees me in all creatures and sees all creatures in me is the one who   lives in me eternally ”.MISSION STATEMENT :Improving the quality of life for mentally handicapped by providing education, training in daily living skills, vocational skills, physically and mental health support, family support and rehabilitate into mainstream them. Educate, train, rehabilitate, mainstream and improve quality of life for mentally challenged persons.to cater the needs of poor mentally challenged children and to provide free needed services to the children.Number of children about 100 in three centres
